qoute: A good model can advance fashion by ten years.
Fashion for the most part is nothing but the ostentation of riches.
Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions.
Fashion is made to become unfashionable.
Fashion is the science of appearance, and it inspires one with the desire to seem rather than to be.
Fashion wears out more clothes than the man.
I base most of my fashion taste on what doesn't itch.
In our own hearts, we mold the whole world's hereafters; and in our own hearts we fashion our own gods.
It pains me physically to see a woman victimized, rendered pathetic, by fashion.
Nothing goes out of fashion sooner than a long dress with a very low neck.
The New is not a fashion, it is a value.
There are a lot of people who must have the table laid in the usual fashion or they will not enjoy the dinner.
There's never a new fashion but it's old.
A good model can advance fashion by ten years.
Fashion for the most part is nothing but the ostentation of riches.
Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions.
Fashion is made to become unfashionable.
Fashion is the science of appearance, and it inspires one with the desire to seem rather than to be.
Fashion wears out more clothes than the man.
I base most of my fashion taste on what doesn't itch.
In our own hearts, we mold the whole world's hereafters; and in our own hearts we fashion our own gods.
It pains me physically to see a woman victimized, rendered pathetic, by fashion.
Nothing goes out of fashion sooner than a long dress with a very low neck.
The New is not a fashion, it is a value.
There are a lot of people who must have the table laid in the usual fashion or they will not enjoy the dinner.
There's never a new fashion but it's old.
What were once vices are the fashion of the day.
When a person is in fashion, all they do is right.
'Women's fashion' is a euphemism for fashion created by men for women.
Change of fashion is the tax levied by the industry of the poor on the vanity of the rich.
Fashion for the most part is nothing but the ostentation of riches.
Fashion is a form of ugliness so intolerable that we have to alter it every six months.
Fashion is never in crisis because clothes are always necessary.
Fashion is something barbarous, for it produces innovation without reason and imitation without benefit.
Fashion is what you adopt when you don't know who you are.
Fashion your life as a garland of beautiful deeds.
Fashion, by which what is really fantastic becomes for a moment the universal.
He who goes against the fashion is himself its slave.
I never cared for fashion much, amusing little seams and witty little pleats: it was the girls I liked.
Ignorance is never out of style. It was in fashion yesterday, it is the rage today and it will set the pace tomorrow.
It is difficult, if not impossible, for most people to think otherwise than in the fashion of their own period.
Nothing is so hideous as an obsolete fashion.
Oh, never mind the fashion. When one has a style of one's own, it is always twenty times better.
Silence is the element in which great things fashion themselves.
Taste is often one of the aspects of fashion.
The majority have no other reason for their opinions than that they are the fashion.
The present condition of fame is merely fashion.
We are persons of quality, I assure you, and women of fashion, and come to see and to be seen.
We at Chrysler borrow money the old fashion way. We pay it back.
We cannot fashion our children after our desires, we must have them and love them as God has given them to us.
You know, one had as good be out of the world, as out of the fashion.
You must be in fashion is the utterance of weak headed mortals.
